pointOfSale

Class TaxPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • pointOfSale.TaxPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class TaxPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Author:
    Stephen Collins, Vanessa Harris, Kolter Bradshaw, Cristhian Ramirez (Date: 4/29/2013) Purpose: Allows a user with administrator privileges to modify the sales tax rate to reflect their local sales tax rate. The sales tax is saved in a text file, and accessed by the ReceiptPanel class when needed. This class is a component of the AdminstratorGUI class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
      Responds to the user clicking the "Update" buttons by modifying the current tax rate to reflect the user entered tax rate, saving the change.
      private void readTax()
      Private helper method which reads the sales tax amount from a text file and sets a double value equal to it.
      private void saveTax()
      Private helper method which saves the sales tax amount to a text file for future use by the program

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaxPanel

        TaxPanel()
        Arranges all necessary components onto a JPanel which is added to the administrator screen. The current tax is display on an uneditable text field. The user user enters the new tax rate in a separate text field.

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
        Responds to the user clicking the "Update" buttons by modifying the current tax rate to reflect the user entered tax rate, saving the change. Contains error checking to ensure the user entry is not empty and represents a non-negative number.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

      • readTax

        private void readTax()
        Private helper method which reads the sales tax amount from a text file and sets a double value equal to it.

      • saveTax

        private void saveTax()
        Private helper method which saves the sales tax amount to a text file for future use by the program
